comment.author: 39191857@N05
comment._content: I love it, what a shot and what a story?  I had read it before as McTigue was an Irish boxing hero but this shot tells so much more.  Look at their dress and compare it with how boxers and their entourage are dressed these days.  Can you imagine one of them striding across a field in a suit?  Not likely even for those in the lower reaches.  Well done NLI yet another beauty to set up our weekend!

comment.author: 47290943@N03
